name: BBB- Belem By Bike
description: Join us on a relaxed bike ride alongside the  scenic seaside road called the 'Marginal', Cascais. From Belém – one of Lisbon’s most iconic districts to Parede, Carcavelos and you will get to experience our "Portuguese Riviera"  by bike with local eyes, in a very personalized way. We will  and all the way to Parede along the Tagus River. Half way through, we make a short stop  where we offer you a special and typical drink and another stop in an old traditional place where you  will try some of our typical specialties . These 4 hours (10kms) means a slow and panoramic pace. We stop at the interesting spots of our city and tell you about what’s around. It is the best way to get to know the Portuguese West Coast in  just one Ride.
